reaction.afir.find_target_fragments(atoms, target_commands: List[str]) → Mapping[str, List[List[int]]]¶

Find target fragments in the structure to react.

This is a wrapper for group commands as there are several ways to defind a (atomic) group but we need a group of molecules here. Optional ways are using molecule all, using tag…
